events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue is categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back because of wrong product delivery.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's wrong product order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund for your order, and Iâ€™m here to help resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund once you confirm the return shipment of the wrong item.
That sounds good. I will send the product back today and share the tracking number once shipped.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure your refund was received successfully and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard back, we will close the case now. Please feel free to contact us again if you need assistance.
